headline: Cutting Off Birth Control
snippet: To the Editor:     Re ''Can This Be Pro-Life?,'' by Nicholas D. Kristof (column, Oct. 9):

headline: What to Ask About Birth Control in Women
snippet: Talking points for patients and physicians.

headline: Deciphering the Menu of Birth Control Options
snippet: Dr. Daniel R. Mishell Jr., on the many birth control choices for women.

headline: Weighing the Health Benefits of Birth Control
snippet: Many manufacturers and doctors are promoting the noncontraceptive benefits of contraception.

headline: The Catholic Church and Birth Control
snippet: To the Editor:     Re ''The Pope vs. the Pill,'' by John L. Allen Jr. (Op-Ed, July 27), on the Roman Catholic Church's continued commitment to the papal ban on birth control:

headline: Birth Control for Others
snippet: A historian examines a century of miscalculation and arrogance by population planners.
